programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keunikan batik, tenun, songket, busana dari peradaban melayu diselitkan dengan sedikit sejarah serta asal usul penghasilan kain.

programme.title: Rezeki Api Ep1
programme.desc: Fokus kulinari, dari dapur kayu kampung hingga peniaga bandar. Teknik api unik, suku kaum, kulinari bumi kenyalang. Lengkap tema semulajadi: air, tanah, udara (angin), & api.

programme.title: Dunia Baru The Movie
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula apabila Opie menemui sepucuk surat daripada Anizah yang menyatakan bahawa dia ingin berkahwin dengan teman lelakinya, Fazley, dan telah menguburkan impiannya untuk menyambung pelajaran ke UK.

programme.title: Sejoli
programme.desc: Jo (Bront Palarae) dan Gina (Maya Karin) sedang menyembuhkan hati yang terluka di Phuket apabila takdir mempertemukan mereka. Pada mulanya mereka saling membenci, tetapi apabila mereka mendapat tahu bahawa bekas kekasih masing-masing, Hardy (Remy Ishak) dan Nita (Izara Aishah), akan berkahwin, mereka merancang untuk menggagalkan majlis perkahwinan tersebut.

programme.title: Nada Siar Ep39
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: 1 Lawan Satu
programme.desc: Saleh dan Radhi, dua 'pejuang' yang datang dari latar belakang berbeza, namun bertemu di gelanggang pertarungan. Saleh dibesarkan dengan kemahiran seni mempertahankan diri dan kini sedang mencari adiknya yang telah hilang. Radhi pula bertarung demi menyelamatkan adik perempuannya, Sara, yang sedang sakit tenat dan memerlukan RM50,000 untuk rawatan.

programme.title: Longkai
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang geng 'longkai' (tonto atau penunda kereta). Eddie dan Bada ialah adik-beradik longkai yang terkenal. Semua kenderaan yang ditunda oleh mereka akan dibawa ke bengkel Rimau. Walaupun dia seorang wanita, Rimau berperwatakan sedikit tomboy dan lasak. Rimau telah jatuh cinta dengan Bada, tetapi dia tidak pernah berani untuk meluahkan perasaannya walaupun dia nampak tough.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit Generasi GIG
programme.desc: Selepas menyelamatkan Nadia (Afifah Nasir), seorang wanita moden yang telah lama diminatinya, Adnan (Aiman Tino), seorang penghantar makanan, mula jatuh cinta tanpa menyedari bahawa dia mungkin terperangkap dalam rancangan tersembunyi wanita tersebut.

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Salah Alamat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luqman pernah mengenali seorang gadis bernama Diana ketika Diana melanggar keretanya dahulu. Diana berpenampilan seksi dan mengamalkan cara hidup barat membuatkan Luqman bersangka buruk terhadap Diana. Satu hari, Luqman ke masjid dan terserempak dengan seorang gadis cantik iaitu Adawiyah. Tanpa mengetahui, Adawiyah dan Diana adalah orang yang sama. Diana pernah terlibat dengan kemalangan dan sejak itu hidupnya berubah sepenuhnya.

programme.title: Abang Lejen
programme.desc: Dua beradik yang kehilangan ibu bapa mereka sejak kecil. Si abang sanggup mempertaruhkan nyawanya demi melindungi adiknya walau apa pun yang terjadi.

programme.title: Ruang Temu Ep39
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tam Suhaimi yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Kaki Kitai
programme.desc: Din AKA Drango dan Ayoi adalah dua sahabat yang juga merupakan penipu. Mereka berdua datang ke Kuala Lumpur dan secara tidak sengaja bertemu semula dengan seorang kawan lama yang kini bekerja sebagai pegawai polis. Namun, hidup mereka mula berubah apabila mereka menemui sebuah beg sampah yang dipenuhi dengan wang tunai, yang kemudian mereka gunakan untuk membayar hutang.

programme.title: Istanbul Aku Datang
programme.desc: Seorang gadis muda dari Malaysia pergi ke Istanbul untuk bertemu dengan teman lelaki kesayangannya, namun gadis yang naif itu tidak tahu apa yang akan berlaku kepada kehidupannya di sana.

programme.title: Main Wayang Ep39
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem Jogho

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka mengisahkan sekumpulan penunggang motosikal yang kasar berhenti di tepi jalan, dan tidak lama kemudian, kesemua merekakecuali Bobjatuh sakit secara misteri.

programme.title: Hantu Dalam Botol Kicap
programme.desc: Tiga kanak-kanak yang jahil melanggar peraturan di rumah nenek mereka, menyebabkan neraka terlepas bebas.

programme.title: Peluang Ketiga
programme.desc: Zulaikha dan Yusuf telah menjalinkan hubungan sejak zaman universiti lagi. Namun, hubungan mereka terputus apabila Yusuf tidak bersetuju dengan keputusan Zulaikha untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi. Zulaikha kemudian bertemu dengan Mikhail, seorang lelaki berhati mulia yang sentiasa menyokong segala impiannya. Sementara itu, Yusuf meneruskan kerjayanya sebagai pelumba basikal profesional dan jatuh cinta dengan seorang wartawan sukan bernama Alya.Namun, apabila Mikhail melamar Zulaikha, hati Yusuf mula dilanda cemburu. Mampukah Yusuf melupakan Zulaikha dan menerima hakikat bahawa cinta mereka mungkin sudah berlalu?

programme.title: Dunia Baru The Movie
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula apabila Opie menemui sepucuk surat daripada Anizah yang menyatakan bahawa dia ingin berkahwin dengan teman lelakinya, Fazley, dan telah menguburkan impiannya untuk menyambung pelajaran ke UK.

Walaupun masih mencari kerja, dia sangat tenang dan tetap ceria. Gie reda dengan situasi menimpanya.

programme.title: Kaki Kitai
programme.desc: Din AKA Drango dan Ayoi adalah dua sahabat yang juga merupakan penipu. Mereka berdua datang ke Kuala Lumpur dan secara tidak sengaja bertemu semula dengan seorang kawan lama yang kini bekerja sebagai pegawai polis. Namun, hidup mereka mula berubah apabila mereka menemui sebuah beg sampah yang dipenuhi dengan wang tunai, yang kemudian mereka gunakan untuk membayar hutang.

programme.title: Istanbul Aku Datang
programme.desc: Seorang gadis muda dari Malaysia pergi ke Istanbul untuk bertemu dengan teman lelaki kesayangannya, namun gadis yang naif itu tidak tahu apa yang akan berlaku kepada kehidupannya di sana.

programme.title: Main Wayang Ep39
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem Jogho

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka mengisahkan sekumpulan penunggang motosikal yang kasar berhenti di tepi jalan, dan tidak lama kemudian, kesemua merekakecuali Bobjatuh sakit secara misteri.

programme.title: Hantu Dalam Botol Kicap
programme.desc: Tiga kanak-kanak yang jahil melanggar peraturan di rumah nenek mereka, menyebabkan neraka terlepas bebas.

programme.title: Peluang Ketiga
programme.desc: Zulaikha dan Yusuf telah menjalinkan hubungan sejak zaman universiti lagi. Namun, hubungan mereka terputus apabila Yusuf tidak bersetuju dengan keputusan Zulaikha untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi. Zulaikha kemudian bertemu dengan Mikhail, seorang lelaki berhati mulia yang sentiasa menyokong segala impiannya. Sementara itu, Yusuf meneruskan kerjayanya sebagai pelumba basikal profesional dan jatuh cinta dengan seorang wartawan sukan bernama Alya.Namun, apabila Mikhail melamar Zulaikha, hati Yusuf mula dilanda cemburu. Mampukah Yusuf melupakan Zulaikha dan menerima hakikat bahawa cinta mereka mungkin sudah berlalu?

programme.title: Dunia Baru The Movie
programme.desc: Filem ini bermula apabila Opie menemui sepucuk surat daripada Anizah yang menyatakan bahawa dia ingin berkahwin dengan teman lelakinya, Fazley, dan telah menguburkan impiannya untuk menyambung pelajaran ke UK.

programme.title: Sejoli
programme.desc: Jo (Bront Palarae) dan Gina (Maya Karin) sedang menyembuhkan hati yang terluka di Phuket apabila takdir mempertemukan mereka. Pada mulanya mereka saling membenci, tetapi apabila mereka mendapat tahu bahawa bekas kekasih masing-masing, Hardy (Remy Ishak) dan Nita (Izara Aishah), akan berkahwin, mereka merancang untuk menggagalkan majlis perkahwinan tersebut.

programme.title: Nada Siar Ep39
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: 1 Lawan Satu
programme.desc: Saleh dan Radhi, dua 'pejuang' yang datang dari latar belakang berbeza, namun bertemu di gelanggang pertarungan. Saleh dibesarkan dengan kemahiran seni mempertahankan diri dan kini sedang mencari adiknya yang telah hilang. Radhi pula bertarung demi menyelamatkan adik perempuannya, Sara, yang sedang sakit tenat dan memerlukan RM50,000 untuk rawatan.

programme.title: Longkai
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang geng 'longkai' (tonto atau penunda kereta). Eddie dan Bada ialah adik-beradik longkai yang terkenal. Semua kenderaan yang ditunda oleh mereka akan dibawa ke bengkel Rimau. Walaupun dia seorang wanita, Rimau berperwatakan sedikit tomboy dan lasak. Rimau telah jatuh cinta dengan Bada, tetapi dia tidak pernah berani untuk meluahkan perasaannya walaupun dia nampak tough.

programme.title: Pestaria Ep4
programme.desc: Pelbagai warna muzik penuh dengan sensasi dengan sentuhan budaya! Bekerjasama dan bersatu di atas pentas dengan barisan bintang terkenal.

programme.title: Suster El Ep43
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep22
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Jatuh Bangun Ibu Ojek Online Hingga Menjadi Pengusaha
programme.desc: Sejak suaminya meninggal, Winda terpaksa berhempas pulas mencari wang untuk meneruskan kehidupan bersama anaknya. Walaupun dia seorang wanita, Winda sanggup menjadi pemandu teksi motosikal dalam talian. Dia harus menanggung semua kepahitan hidup dengan kesabaran sehingga dia dapat menjadi seorang usahawan yang berjaya.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep23
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep108
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Lampung Geh Ep9
programme.desc: Dokumentari perjalanan yang merakam keunikan Lampung, daripada keindahan alam semula jadi hingga pelbagai aktiviti menarik.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep282
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Dua Hati Sarangheyo To SarangBeo
programme.desc: Keni (Fendy Chow) dipaksa menyamar sebagai idola Korea demi menyelamatkan acara 'meet and greet' yang dianjurkan oleh Erika. Dengan berat hati, Keni akhirnya bersetuju dengan permintaan tersebut.

programme.title: Inbox 2023 Ep4
programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep1
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep18
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep283
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Tergila Gila Sama Kamu Core
programme.desc: Semuanya bermula apabila Rizki (Elryan Carlen) hilang ingatan dan diselamatkan oleh Silvi (Larasati Nugroho). Atas pengaruh abangnya, Silvi bersetuju untuk berkahwin dengan Rizki yang kini dikenali sebagai Dul. Sementara itu, Beno (Masaji Wijayanto) yang risau dengan kehilangan Rizki, mula mencari abangnya. Namun, Beno terkejut apabila mendapati abangnya kini hidup sebagai seorang petani. Satu insiden menyebabkan kepala Rizki terhentak, dan ingatannya pulih sepenuhnya. Dia kemudiannya meminta Beno untuk meneruskan persiapan perkahwinannya dengan Silvi.

programme.title: Intimate Concert Ep5
programme.desc: Konsert istimewa para bintang buat yang tersayang. Persembahan cinta yang tulus untuk keluarga, sahabat dan peminat yang menyokongnya. Menyingkap perjalanan hidup dan kerjaya sang bintang. Apakah kejutan yang akan disampaikan? Apakah cerita lain yang akan dikongsikan?

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep86
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep19
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep284
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Pepet Terus Kalau Suka Jangan Kasih Kendor
programme.desc: Naya (Soraya Rasyid) yang mempunyai trauma sejak kecil menyimpan dendam terhadap ayahnya, Jojo (Bara Valentino). Dia tidak hanya memendam perasaan tersebut, malah ingin membalas dendam. Namun, tindakan Naya malah membuatkan dia semakin rapat dengan Jojo, tapi dengan perasaan yang berbeza. Di pihak Jojo, dia langsung tidak menyedari bahawa Naya mendekatinya untuk membalas dendam.

programme.title: Pestaria Ep5
programme.desc: Pelbagai warna muzik penuh dengan sensasi dengan sentuhan budaya! Bekerjasama dan bersatu di atas pentas dengan barisan bintang terkenal.

programme.title: The Pirates

programme.desc: A competitive reality show that focuses on ultimate outdoor camping while exploring iconic landmarks and diverse culinary cultures. Participants visit famous attractions and taste local cuisine, featuring exciting games and unique challenges inspired by Shennongjia.

programme.title: Love Actually Season 4 (Repackaged) Ep4
programme.desc: A group of young men and women over the age of 30 are invited to stay in a modern house in Shanghai to embark on a 30-day journey to find love and grow from strangers to friends. Guests like Xie Nan, Chunye Zhang, Tang Yixin, and Xu Yiyang will witness their sweet moments together.

programme.title: A Wonderful Life Starts with Health Ep8
programme.desc: The show tailored for women, combines fashion and cultural care while promoting emotional well-being. It shares a positive lifestyle, recommends quality products and travel routes, and provides health knowledge from multiple perspectives.

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep51
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 4 Ep8
programme.desc: A dating program for singles and divorced individuals over marriage age. Each episode features four male and three female guests who engage in one-on-one conversations. They will be arranged in a room to foster deeper connections. Love never comes late!

programme.title: Ace Actress Ep5
programme.desc: As the first reality show about training and selecting actresses in ancient clothing, Angie Chiu, Tamia Liu, Zhang Xiao Long, Joseph Cheng, Aarif Rahman, and Kevin Yan would choose the Ace Actress through various acting exams and professional guidance.

programme.title: People's Palate Ep7
programme.desc: This food documentary reality show features Nicholas Tse as the "Taste Explorer." He travels with guests to discover local cultures and beautiful landscapes, tasting various traditional dishes.

programme.desc: A competitive reality show that focuses on ultimate outdoor camping while exploring iconic landmarks and diverse culinary cultures. Participants visit famous attractions and taste local cuisine, featuring exciting games and unique challenges inspired by Shennongjia.

programme.title: My Boyfriend Ep15
programme.desc: CEO Yi Ning enters a contractual marriage with Shen Qianze, unaware of his revenge motive against her family. Initially filled with hatred, Shen falls for Yi Ning while fighting to protect her company. After his uncle Su Jingxuan frames Yi Ning and seizes her business, Shen helps expose Sus crimes, restoring justice and renewing their relationship built on trust.

programme.title: Love Behind the Mask Ep24
programme.desc: The story follows Wen Yanshu and Mu Han, who meet and fall in love while hiding their actual identities. They protect their homes and strive for a better world together, finding comfort in each others past wounds and bravely facing their responsibilities and missions.

programme.desc: Explore Portuguese-speaking countries' traditions, learn historical stories, and enjoy music, dance, handicrafts, and films. Showcasing cultural fusion, highlighting uniqueness, and appreciating diverse ethnic cultures in China and Portuguese-speaking countries.

programme.title: The Melody of You Season 2 (Live) Ep10
programme.desc: Season 2 features 7diverse musicians: Chang Chen-yue, Zhang Bicheng, Philip Lau, Lil Ghost, Nana Ou-Yang, Wang Heye, and Chen Zhuoxuan. They form a team to attend a music festival in Malaysia.Throughout their journey, they explore local culture and music, fostering cultural connections through borderless musical collaboration.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep4049
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep3170
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep4049
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep278
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2349
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep62
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5100

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep35
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2022
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep63
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5101
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhens family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husbands departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Marriage With A Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and her boyfriend of seven years, Sean, are to be married in a week but both cheated on each other three days before the wedding. Faced with each of their perfect partners, Kiki and Sean ignore their responsibilities to each other and choose to go their separate ways

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: Cape No. 7
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer tries to deliver seven old love letters attentioned to a Tomoko. As he falls in love with a young Japanese model also named Tomoko, he unravels their serendipitous connection.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora. After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong. Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhens family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husbands departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the speed gang, led by Johnny, and Kuos sister Carrie is molested by Johnnys brother Michael. Kuos family continues to be harassed by the speed gang while on the island can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: Intimate Confessions Of A Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Lohs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to harm Wongs disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong has to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Dukes daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.desc: Aperture - When an assault at gunpoint is witnessed through a neighboring window, the squad scrambles to locate the victim to confirm she's safe; a threat to extort the victim's family leads to a shocking suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep22
programme.desc: Post-rage - Benson investigates a string of sexual assaults targeting local female psychiatrists; the squad celebrates a promotion.

programme.title: Chicago Med S10 Ep1
programme.desc: Sink or Swim - When a commuter ship capsizes, our ED finds itself underwater as they struggle to treat the influx of new patients and deal with the bold new employees taking charge.

programme.title: What Children Do
programme.desc: A comedy about two estranged sisters brought back into each other's lives by the impending death of their grandmother.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Beat the Heat - The remaining chefs are tasked with oven roasting, steaming or deep frying.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S4 Ep9
programme.desc: The Thunderdome - For the first time in the competition, the chefs are no longer working on teams and must survive the next cooking challenge on their own.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12 Ep119
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S12 Ep97
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: Mauldin (Thora Birch) is a strong-willed but misguided young woman who encourages her millions of blog followers to apply her scientific formula to all relationships in order to prevent heartache.

programme.title: Asteroid: Final Impact
programme.desc: Scientist Steve Thomas must risk his reputation, career, and life in order to save mankind from a huge asteroid headed straight for Earth

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It
programme.desc: Kate Reddy (Sarah Jessica Parker) manages the ultimate balancing act between work and her adoring family in this comedy based on the bestseller by Allison Pearson.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: Doom: Annihilation
programme.desc: Based on the popular original video game, Doom: Annihilation is an explosive, terrifying thrill ride.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death

programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Penguin Proposal - Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Anatomy Gone Wild - Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Fly Free - Observe vet Karinas fight to save a koala mauled by dogs, then face the clinics toughest customer with vet Tim: a rainbow lorikeet whos quick to bite. Scoop up a peeved possum with rescuer Chantel and bond with Meaghan over a gaggle of goslings.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where theyre not welcome.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Little Penguin - Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Giant Creepy Crawlers - Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep6

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for its wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Australia - Scan the Australian skies, which regularly deliver some of the worlds most volatile weather. Await cooling monsoon rains, watch lightning ignite vast wildfires, and marvel at the ingenious adaptations that help wildlife deal with these extremes.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep2
programme.desc: North America - Experience the powerful, colourful phenomena that swirl across the heavens in North America. Watch polar bears search for food under the aurora borealis, map the frigid path of a polar vortex, and elude violent tornadoes with a prairie dog family.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Turning 10 In 2025!
programme.desc: Check out these awesome tracks that are all getting a badge for their tenth birthdays in 2025!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep37
programme.desc: The Poison Ravine - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep38
programme.desc: The Master Key - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep40
programme.desc: Familiar Feeling - When Puss discovers the coveted Crown of Souls gemstone was split into three pieces for three witch sisters, he finds Malviola and asks for her stone

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday / Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruzs help to perform a dance for Moms birthday. Though its hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep15
programme.desc: Rodney J. Dinkle, Babysitter / Lights Out - When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep3
programme.desc: It's A Secret / Queen Of Thighs - Oh cannot keep a secret when Tip tells him she's planning a surprise party/Lucy's Queen of Thighs video goes viral and turns her into a celebrity.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sherman's Pet/ Marco Polo - Sherman begs Peabody to keep a Wolly Mammoth he names Captain Cools as his pet; Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges to discover spaghetti.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders Of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: The Night And the Fury - The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep13
programme.desc: Australian Blunder Down Under - When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep3
programme.desc: Bully For You / The Ra Animator - Bully For You When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. The Ra-minator Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist / Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelps first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to DAngelo to aid an injured dragon, and DAngelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isnt interested

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep9
programme.desc: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti - Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep7
programme.desc: Ding Dong Day \ Grand Sam - Its Pawstons annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and its Tags year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep8
programme.desc: Clucky Day \ Take Me Out to the Fetch Game - Scooch is bummed out because hes missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When theres a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, its up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they dont have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep22
programme.desc: That Stinking Feeling / Go for The Gold - When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founders Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep39
programme.desc: The Last Dumont - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep40

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep20
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus / Furricane - When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep16
programme.desc: Double Booked / Gym Enemy Cricket - When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.
